overview: Peter B. Hunt guides the strategic growth of sales and marketing team at Environmental Operating Systems. He brings over 20 years experience building technology-based companies to EOS, both nationally and internationally. Most recently, he was responsible for global sales and business development for Mesa Imaging AG, a 3D camera systems provider based in Zurich. Prior positions have included EnerTrac, Inc., providing sensor-based data services for the petroleum distribution industry; Fast Flix Corporation, a DVD-to-consumer kiosk network which he founded and sold; and extensive marketing and sales operations experience with Sycamore Networks.

relationships.title: Vice President of Sales and Marketing
